channel.title: CVE Feed for WPoperation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPoperation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32118|2024-08-02T15:03:29.086Z -- wpoperation -- salert%20%E2%80%93%20fake%20sales%20notification%20woocommerce
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPoperation SALERT – Fake Sales Notification WooCommerce plugin <= 1.2.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-24803|2024-06-27T20:46:45.261Z -- wpoperation -- ultra%20companion%20%E2%80%93%20companion%20plugin%20for%20wpoperation%20themes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPoperation Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes: from n/a through 1.1.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-24803|2024-02-10T07:49:02.496Z -- wpoperation -- ultra%20companion%20%E2%80%93%20companion%20plugin%20for%20wpoperation%20themes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPoperation Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes: from n/a through 1.1.9.
